column3: vocal  eminem yo manix man i think i just spotted my prey there she is check her out yea i know she's with her man and everything but i can still get her man 'cause you know me just drop a couple of smooth rhymes on her and i got her you know what i'm saying aight i'll tell you what i'mma do about her man aight check this out  verse hey baby let me have a word with your man comiclike slap sound  now lemme show ya exactly where i stand i'd like you to enter my fortress just cause you are just the most gorgeous woman i've ever seen and for just the next few hours of ya life i'd like to bring out the real woman inside you despite you might be in love and all that with your man but lemme get chat with you why don't we get to know each other haven't you ever wondered what it was like to date an mc now what's a woman like you without a man like me and someone like yourself i can grow very fond of beyond a doubt and i would always hold onto your love and be faithful i promise cause i'm as loyal as a puppy and i'd treat you like a goddess that we would've stumble onto each other but first wait before you're lured i want to know if you're insured and if you're sure you're gonna be able to endure a tremendous amount of pain that seems endless strenuous brawn and brain but yet when this whole thing is over and i make it through the ride then i'd gladly stand by your side
